ing.item: Canned apricot halves; drained and chopped
Hungry Jack Microwave Ready Regular Syrup (from 1lb 8oz container)

directions.step:
In small bowl, combine cream cheese and honey; blend well. Stir in apricots. Spoon and spread apricot mixture onto 4 waffles. Top with remaining waffles. Serve with syrup.
CALORIES: 380 SODIUM: 630MG
CHOLESTEROL: 40MG FAT: 13G
CARBOHYDRATE: 60G SAT: 6G
From <Meals In Minutes>, a Pillsbury Classic Cookbook. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
